content: Credit Card DBS Multiplier Savings Asked by Huang YixuanAsked on 14 Aug 2019How do I link my ATM/ debit card to my Multiplier account?Currently I only have an ATM/ debit card for my old DBS remix account, I want to close that account.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Pierre TeoLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 19 Aug 2019Here’s how to link your ATM card to a specific DBS bank account:Login to your DBS iBanking on desktopUnder Cards, select Link Card to Deposit Account for ATM UseChoose the ATM card you wish to linkChoose the account you want to set as the card’s primary accountChoose a secondary account (if neccessary)Click submitHope this helps!3 comments2

See all 3 comments Brenda Cheong18 Aug 2019If Im currently using POSB Passion Debit Card, do I follow the above steps as well?Huang Yixuan19 Aug 2019Hey Brenda! From what I see yes! It's the same process for all cards!
